subtopics.content:
• Capgemini agreed to acquire India-based BPM firm WNS for $3.3 billion in an all-cash deal.
• WNS adds $1.2 billion in revenue to Capgemini.
• The deal strengthens Capgemini’s AI-powered process services.

• JSW Paints signed a definitive agreement to acquire approximately 75% stake in Akzo Nobel India for about $1.5 billion.
• The acquisition reshapes competitive dynamics in India’s paint sector.

subtopics.subtopic: Asian Paints exits Akzo Nobel stake
subtopics.content:
• Asian Paints sold its entire 4.42% stake in Akzo Nobel India for ₹7.34 billion (~$85.7 million).
• The sale was executed through bulk deals.

• Torrent Pharmaceuticals announced plans to acquire a majority stake in JB Chemicals for ₹19,500 crore.
• The deal is pending Competition Commission of India (CCI) approval.
• Post-acquisition, Torrent would become India’s second most valued pharma firm.

• Tata Motors struck a $4.36 billion all-cash deal to acquire Italian commercial vehicle maker Iveco.
• This marks Tata Motors’ largest acquisition to date.
